subject: Rowing
lead_paragraph: Eight course records were set on the first day of the 44th annual Head of the Charles Regatta in Cambridge, Mass. Emma Twig and Juliette Haigh of New Zealand, the winners in the women’s doubles, set a record of 17 minutes 46 seconds over the three-mile upstream course. Gevvie Stone of Newton, Mass., won the women’s single championship 31 years after her parents captured the singles championship.
